column1: Table 16. Life table for the non-Hispanic black population: United States, 2017

column2: Probability of dying between ages x and x + 1
column4: Number dying between ages x and x + 1
column5: Person-years lived between ages x and x + 1
column6: Total number of person-years lived above age x
column7: Expectation of life at age x

column1: NOTES: This life table is based on death rates that have been adjusted for race and ethnicity misclassification on death certificates. Updated classification ratios were applied; see Technical Notes.
SOURCE: NCHS, National Vital Statistics System, Mortality.
